description: Keeping you cool, comfortable, and sweat-free throughout all parts of your day. Featuring our DropTemp™ Cooling tech and UPF 50, this clean-cut tee is as versatile as they come. Get out, get active, or keep it-low key in DropTemp™ All Day Cooling.
name: Saxx Underwear DropTemp All Day Cooling SS Pocket Tee - Mens
